sentences.en: It is widely acknowledged that extensive deforestation would lead to flooding.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，大面积的森林砍伐会导致洪水泛滥。

sentences.en: These developments have caused major changes like additional erosion of the Earth's surface and deforestation.
sentences.cn: 这些发展导致了重大变化，如地球表面的进一步侵蚀和森林砍伐。

sentences.en: Unlike meat from those filthy places, it will not pollute rivers and streams, deplete groundwater or cause deforestation.
sentences.cn: 不像来自那些污秽场所的肉，它不会污染河流和小溪，不会大量消耗地下水，也不会引起滥伐森林。
